alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Lower Snake River Plain; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 18 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm winds will impact portions of west central Teton, southwestern Fremont, southeastern Jefferson, southeastern Butte, northwestern Bonneville, Madison and northwestern Bingham Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorm winds along a line extending from near Plano to 9 miles southwest of Roberts to near Southeast Inl. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Idaho Falls, Rexburg, Rigby, Ririe Reservoir, Lorenzo, Ammon, Shelley, Iona, Sugar City, Ucon, Menan, Ririe, Roberts, Firth, Lewisville, Archer, Rose, Plano, Basalt, and Green Canyon Hot Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Lower Snake River Plain; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
